text: The Silsila-e-Saifia (; ) is a Muslim Sufi order based in Pakistan. It has a following in the United Kingdom, Europe, United States, Canada, Afghanistan, India, Bangladesh and various countries of the Middle East. The order is linked to the lineage of Naqshbandiyyah Mujaddadiyyah. The order's grandmaster is Akhundzada Saif-ur-Rahman Mubarak.https://apkpure.com/silsila-e- saifia/com.appesta.silsilasaifia ==References== Category:Sufism Category:Religion in Pakistan
title: Saifia
